overwatch.gui

Class GenericPanel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • overwatch.gui.GenericPanel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericPanelButtoned

    public class GenericPanel<T>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Generic panel with a left-side search panel and right-side main panel. All tabs based on basic editing of attributes should extend this one. Templated on the SearchPanel type.
    Version:
    2
    Author:
    Lee Coakley
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
